1.title: It begins here

11.content:
It was sunny afternoon in saffron and Sabrina the gym leader was wanting to take a vacation since the bags under Sabrina's eyes tell that she had been working very hard at the gym and hadn't have a break in a while,

"I need a vacation, but I can't close the gym. I need someone who would take care of everything?"

Sabrina sat and thought for awhile when she thought of something and she then use her psychic powers to find someone, she searched a bit when she found him, "now I just wait for him to fall asleep" said Sabrina. Ash woke up groggily, "oh, my head" said ash, as he stood he felt different after looking around room, he noticed a mirror and he turned to see it and got the shock of his life!

"What the...."

he muttered as he saw his...er her reflection in the the mirror, which had a mirror a note next to the mirror which says

Good Morning Ash,
I know your wondering what is going on and why you are in my body, right?
You see I really needed a vacation and you seemed like the best choice to intrust my gym to, so please take care of my gym while I am gone and don't worry about your Pokémon, I will look after them as I trust you to look after my pokemon
Sabrina

Ash was pissed at the body switch but then calmed down she closed the gym for a couple of days to repair the gym and study old matches (including Ash vs Sabrina) after those first couple days passed Ash took on all challengers only losing a couple of times. Soon a month had passed and when he woke up he wasn't back in his body but the body of....

114122.content:
Furious, Ash decides to give Sabrina a piece of her mind. "You stupid bitch! You can't just put me in a girl's body just because you feel like it! I want to be back in my own body right now!" She rages in her cute new voice.

This makes Sabrina mad as well. "How about I just make that your body? How would you like that jerk?" The call ends, the shock apparent on Ash's face as she realizes that she is now stuck as Jasmine!

Suddenly, her head starts spinning and she feels queasy. She decides to lay down, try to catch some sleep. What happens when she wakes?
114122.title: Request denied.

1141221.content:
Ash can feel his head pounding after his fight with Sabrina, and his eyes feel like they have been glued shut. Just as he's about to go back to sleep, he hears a familiar voice, calling to him. "Ash, wake up! Ash!" It's Misty!

Ash opens his eyes and smiles at her, still half asleep. "I'm awake Misty. No worries." The redhead gives a sigh of relief. "We were worried Ash. You caught a fever and started burning up."

Ash gives a weak laugh. "That would explain a lot." He says with a wry grin on his face. Misty looks concerned, however. "What do you mean? Explain what?"

"I had the weirdest dream, where I had to live as other people. And now I feel a bit weaker than before." Misty smiles again. "Nope, you're the same as always Ash!" "Well, that's a relief." He chuckles. He sits up, stops suddenly, and looks down, confusion and terror on his face. He turns to Misty and asks...
1141221.title: The old and the new.

Ash walked over to the video game section as he was looking through the costumes

"Hey Ash"

"Oh hey Misty, we were going to come over to see you later"

"Oh we'll I got back early & decided to kill sometime & saw you come in here, so what you doing in here?"
